ShadowDuke2, ofcourse there is always people like you on the internet which is sad I think, shall I tell you why ?

Okay meny people are crying out loud because theire download speed with this patch around the internet is really bad, 30 Kb/s to 100 kb/s, when I got the patch it was with 120 Kb/s, and I can see people are getting this torrent pretty fast even some with 800 Kb/s.

Another problem people also have is they cannot download the whole patch for some error, even one of my friends got that problem, therefore I uploaded this as a torrent so people could get the whole patch and pretty fast.

And you say this is a free patch, yeah it is.. I'm not here to upload illegal stuff, Torrents is NOT only for illegal stuff, my intention with my Torrents in the future is to upload Demos, big trailers, big patches and other free stuff which is big and people would like to get.
Fileshack only offers 500kb/s to anonymous users. both my friend and i are pulling down at 2MB/s on this torrent. you do the math, 2 hours to download versus 20 minutes
